name: Flesh Guardian
description: The Flesh Guardian is a Medium Construct with a solid build and an animated presence, created as a protector by a skilled magic practitioner. It has formidable melee attack capabilities.
memorable: Its ability to absorb lightning damage while becoming a powerful berserk attacker makes it a unique creature in battles.
goals: Typically created to protect a specific individual or location, it acts as a guardian and enforcer.
relations: Often associated with its creator, who may also be a spellcaster; can be found alongside other constructs or animated creatures.
environment: Usually found in the homes or lairs of powerful spellcasters, or guarding specific locations or treasures.
strengths: Immunities to various conditions and damage from nonmagical weapons, coupled with its ability to absorb lightning damage and perform powerful melee attacks.
weaknesses: Low armor class leaves it vulnerable to attacks, and its low Dexterity makes it clumsy in avoiding ranged combat.
attacks: Multiattack with slam attacks and the ability to hurl objects at foes, dealing significant bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Lightning Bolt attack that can unleash a devastating blast of lightning damage, usable once per day while bloodied.
additional_information: Can enter a berserk state if bloodied, attacking the nearest target.
Immunity to being charmed, fatigued, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, or poisoned.
Has advantage on saving throws against magical effects due to Magic Resistance.
Does not require air, sustenance, or sleep, functioning continuously.
Rattled by fire damage, potentially affecting its performance.
